Hello Folks,

I am a newbie.  So, please bear with me here.  I downloaded Nero Micro using this torrent, tried to follow the instructions that came with it.  I copied and pasted the serial from the notepad.  That's where I am stuck.  It says the serial is not valid.  I am not able to proceed further.  What am I doing wrong?  Can anyone help with a detailed explanation how to install this with the patch?  Any information is highly appreciated. :) ~Kevin~

By the way, I am trying to install Nero Micro on two PC desktops, one with Windows XP Pro & the other with Windows 7 Pro, both 32 bit and with Service Pack + all updates.
~Kevin~

1. Start the installer
2. Enter the key when it asks
3. When it says "Invalid serial" - run the patcher (DO NOT CLOSE THE INSTALLER!)
4. Then, back to the installer and click on "install" again
5. Enjoy :D


or try this

If you have "patching failed" ,
go to regedit, current user, software, and delete "nero" directory.
It contains old info from previous Nero installations and follow the above instructions
